  Retrieves details of an existing E2E Container Registry instance.
---

# e2e_container_registry (Data Source)

Provides information about an existing E2E Container Registry project.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Example Usage
```hcl
data "e2e_container_registry" "example" {
  location    = "Delhi"
  project_id  = "your-project-id"     # Replace with your actual project ID
  id          = "your-registry-id"    # Replace with the Container Registry project ID
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the Container Registry project. To find the registry ID, refer to your E2E Container Registry project list.
- `project_id` (String) The project ID under which the Container Registry is created.
- `location` (String) The region where the Container Registry is deployed (e.g., "Delhi").

### Read-Only

- `project_name` (String) Name of the Container Registry project.
- `setup_status` (String) Current setup status of the Container Registry (e.g., "CREATED").
- `severity` (String) Vulnerability severity level configured for image scans (e.g., "low", "medium", "high", "critical").
- `prevent_vul` (Boolean) Whether pushing vulnerable container images is prevented.
